articles.author: Arslan Ali
articles.title: Natural Gas and Oil Forecast: Geopolitical Tensions vs. China Demand In Play - FX Empire
articles.description: Amidst OPEC+’s cuts and China’s wavering demand, geopolitical tensions could reshape the natural gas and oil markets, promising unexpected shifts.
articles.content:
NG Price Chart
Natural Gas (NG)s market dynamics show a significant upturn, with prices ascending by 1.77% to $1.8960, as charted on a 4-hour timeframe. The current pivot stands at $1.8494, delineat… [+588 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Elon Musk says his AI startup xAI will open-source its Grok chatbot - Reuters
articles.description: Elon Musk said on Monday his artificial intelligence startup xAI would open-source its ChatGPT challenger "Grok" this week, days after he sued OpenAI for abandoning its original mission in favor of a for-profit model.

articles.author: Will Louch
articles.title: Dealmaking slowdown leaves private equity with record unsold assets - Financial Times
articles.description: Bain report reveals how rapidly industry has grown as well as challenges created by higher interest rates
articles.content:
Private equity groups globally are sitting on a record 28,000 unsold companies worth more than $3tn, as a sharp slowdown in dealmaking creates a crunch for investors looking to sell assets.
